logic

Class Character

  • java.lang.Object
    • logic.Character
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Guard, Hero, Ogre

    public abstract class Character
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    The Character class, superclass to every dynamic element in the game
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected java.util.Random generator
      A random number generator to be used by enemies whose movement is not certain
      protected int posX
      The element's x-axis position's value
      protected int posY
      The element's y-axis position's value
      protected char representation
      The element's representation in-game

    • Constructor Detail

      • Character

        public Character(int x,
                 int y,
                 char rep)
        Constructor for the class. Initializes every field
        Parameters:
        x - Character's initial x-axis position
        y - Character's initial y-axis position
        rep - Character's representation (may or not be changed later on)

    • Method Detail

      • getCoordinates

        public int[] getCoordinates()
        Gets a Character's coordinates
        Returns:
        int array containing the Character's position in the form [x-axis,y-axis]

      • setCoordinates

        public void setCoordinates(int x,
                           int y)
        Places a Character in specific coordinates
        Parameters:
        x - Character's new x-axis position's value
        y - Character's new y-axis position's value

      • getRepresentation

        public char getRepresentation()
        Gets the Character's current representation
        Returns:
        char containing Character's representation

      • setRepresentation

        public void setRepresentation(char newRep)
        Changes a Character's representation
        Parameters:
        newRep - char containing the Character's new representation

      • isNearHero

        public boolean isNearHero(int heroX,
                          int heroY)
        Checks if the Character (an enemy) is in an adjacent position to the Hero
        Parameters:
        heroX - Hero's x-axis position
        heroY - Hero's y-axis position
        Returns:
        true if is in the same or a near cell (diagonals don't count), false otherwise

      • sameCell

        public boolean sameCell(int heroX,
                        int heroY)
        Checks if the Character (an enemy) is in the same cell as the Hero
        Parameters:
        heroX - Hero's x-axis position
        heroY - Hero's y-axis position
        Returns:
        true if is in the same cell, false otherwise

      • toTheLeft

        public boolean toTheLeft(int heroX,
                         int heroY)
        Checks if the Character (an enemy) is in the cell to the Hero's left
        Parameters:
        heroX - Hero's x-axis position
        heroY - Hero's y-axis position
        Returns:
        true if is in the cell to the left, false otherwise

      • toTheRight

        public boolean toTheRight(int heroX,
                          int heroY)
        Checks if the Character (an enemy) is in the cell to the Hero's right
        Parameters:
        heroX - Hero's x-axis position
        heroY - Hero's y-axis position
        Returns:
        true if is in the cell to the right, false otherwise

      • below

        public boolean below(int heroX,
                     int heroY)
        Checks if the Character (an enemy) is in the cell below the Hero
        Parameters:
        heroX - Hero's x-axis position
        heroY - Hero's y-axis position
        Returns:
        true if is in the cell below, false otherwise

      • up

        public boolean up(int heroX,
                  int heroY)
        Checks if the Character (an enemy) is in the cell above the Hero
        Parameters:
        heroX - Hero's x-axis position
        heroY - Hero's y-axis position
        Returns:
        true if is in the cell above, false otherwise
